00015 namespace vorticon

00017 
00018 
00019 class CEGAGraphicsVort : public CEGAGraphics
00020 {
00021 public:
00022  CEGAGraphicsVort(short episode, const std::string& path);
00023 
00024  bool loadData( int version, unsigned char *p_exedata );
00025  short getNumTiles();
00026  int getNumSprites();
00027 
00028  virtual ~CEGAGraphicsVort();
00029 
00030 private:
00031  // Part of the EGAHEAD Data Structure
00032  // Section 1:
00033  long LatchPlaneSize;               //Size of one plane of latch data
00034  long SpritePlaneSize;               //Size of one plane of sprite data
00035  long BitmapTableStart;         //Start locations of the EGAHEAD entries for unmasked graphics (Excluding font and tiles.)
00036  long SpriteStart;     //Where in the EGAHEAD the entries for masked graphics (Sprites) start
00037 
00038  short FontTiles;      //Number of 8x8 tiles. Meant for fonts
00039  long FontLocation;     //Font start location (relative to plane data, but normally 0)
00040  long ScreenTiles;                    //Number of Screengraphics 32x32 tiles (always 0, because they were removed)
00041  long ScreenLocation;                 //Offset of 32x32 tiles (relative to plane data)
00042  short Num16Tiles;                    //Number of 16x16 tiles
00043  long Tiles16Location;                //Offset of 16x16 tiles (relative to plane data)
00044  short NumBitmaps;                    //Number of bitmaps in table
00045  long BitmapLocation;                 //Offset of bitmaps (relative to plane data)
00046  short NumSprites;                    //Number of sprites
00047  long SpriteLocation;                 //Offset of sprites (relative to plane data)
00048  short compressed;                    // LZ compressed data
00049 
00050  // Section 2 is in CEGALatch and section 3 is in EGASprit where also are the to be used graphics
00051  // Here are which will be created, when object of class initialized
00052  CEGALatch *m_Latch;
00053  CEGASprit *m_Sprit;
00054 
00055  SDL_Surface *m_FontSurface;  // 8x8 Tiles
00056  SDL_Surface *m_BigTileSurface; // May be 32x32. Never used in the original games
00057  SDL_Surface *m_TileSurface;  // 16x16 Tiles
00058  SDL_Surface *m_BitmapsSurface; // Bitmaps of the games, like title screen
00059 };
00060 
00061 }
